message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product. I believe you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but  $900,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $700,000?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $850,000. It's a fair price, considering the value you place on the product.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. How about we settle at $775,000?  That's a fair compromise, don't you think?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out on my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $825,000. It's a good compromise, considering the value you place on the product.
Alice, we're getting close.  I'm willing to offer $800,000.  This is a very generous offer considering my other option.
